name: react-app-from-scratch
description: I completed the official [Intro to React](https://reactjs.org/tutorial/tutorial.html), but feel like too much was done for me to completely understand how everything works together.  ~~I will follow [this tutorial](https://medium.com/@JedaiSaboteur/creating-a-react-app-from-scratch-f3c693b84658)~~ The above tutorial is out of date, instead I will initialize the project with webpack and then add React to it.
